description:
Jiang is one of the best ferrymen in
the world and transports everything
over the river. Master Fu has offered
him a large sum of money to transport
all his wares to the other side of the
river. A big puzzle, since there are
foxes and sheep amongst his goods,
and foxes love to eat sheep. Can you
help Jiang to get everything across
safely?
name: Ferryman Puzzle
